name: Double Kick Heroes (itch)
description:
Double Kick Heroes mixes a shoot'em up with a rhythm game!

The game is currently in Private Beta version. We will soon annonce a release date.

You must survive on the highway to hell by killing zombies with your gundillac! Struggle through the 30 levels of total madness and escape from this nightmare! Only the power of Metal can save your band!

You can play with your keyboard, your pad, arcade stick, guitar or drum kit!

If you like the game, please follow us on social medias.
Don't forget to like the facebook page or twitter account!

Grindhouse!

Dev: BlackMagic ~ David Elahee
Art: Gyhyom ~ Guillaume Breton
Audio: Elmobo ~ Frédéric Motte
Community manager ~ Yannick Elahee
